thread.title: Small but clean and tidy hotel
thread.title_full: Small but clean and tidy hotel - Review of Hotel Mirabeau Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sabaudia73
title: Small but clean and tidy hotel
text:
This is my fifth stay in this hotel. close by everything (metro, RER, supermarket, Eiffel tower).
Room are small but clean and pretty new. the shower is of a nice size. The staff is friendly.
value for money if booked ahead.
Room Tip: ask for a room with a courtyard view See more room tips
